About Me

BIO

I am a Full-Stack Software Engineer and an experienced Software Quality Assurance Engineer based in San Diego, CA. I'm always interested in a challenge and I like turning an idea into something that helps me and other people.

Skills

Programming Languages: JavaScript, Python and Java

JavaScript Framework: Node, Express, React, Sequalize and Mongoose

DataBase: MySQL and MongoDB

Experience

I am currently working as an SQA Engineer and I have worked with manual as well as automation testing. I work with Android software testing which include both Android OS and Android Apps.

I also work with consumer electronic products such as TV, SoundBar, AVR, Media Boxes and Set-Top Boxes.

Education

I have a bachelor's degree in Computer Science as well as some supplemental courses I got througout the year after I recieved my degree which includes the "Certified Software Tester" bootcamp course from Escondido adult school and my recent one from UCSD Extention "The Coding Bootcamp" which basically thought me how full-stack web application works and how to make one myself using the MERN Stack.
